headline: CAPLYTA Shows Stronger Remission Results in Phase 3 MDD Data, JNJ Says

headline: Trump at Davos, Netflix Earnings, Supreme Court: What to Watch This Week
summary: Earnings season kicks up a gear, with announcements expected from companies including Johnson & Johnson, Intel and Netflix. Plus, President Trump has headed to the annual World Economic Forum in Davos, Switzerland, where he says he has agreed to meet with various parties regarding Greenland.

headline: Markets Switch to "Risk-Off" Ahead of Trump at Davos
summary: Off session lows by a whisker, the Dow shed -870 points, -1.76%, while the S&P 500 lost -43 points, -2.06%, and the tech-heavy Nasdaq dropped -561 points, -2.39%.

content.title: Markets Switch to "Risk-Off" Ahead of Trump at Davos
